description:
Luffy makes Caesar pay for his crimes against the children, and Smoker risks his life for a chance to see Vergo fall in battle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Surprising Outcome! White Chase vs. Vergo!
Shougeki no Kecchaku! Smoker Tai Vergo!
Une conclusion renversante. Smoker contre Vergo !
Неожиданная развязка! Белый охотник против Верго!
衝撃の決着! 白猟[スモーカー]VSヴェルゴ!
